content:
Greetings Everyone!
Super new to this form so excuse me if I am not sending this message to the right group. I was reaching out if anyone can help in how do I get details of the non-FHIR Data Types of External Payers while recieving US core Profiles

Hi @Virali. Welcome. One thing to note when posting to chat.fhir.org is to make sure you set your "topic" when you ask a question so that each distinct discussion has its own thread. (You posted your original question to "US Core Goal". I used my admin privileges to change the topic to "non-FHIR Data Types.)
I'm not fully understanding the question. Can you explain what you mean by "non-FHIR Data Types of External Payers"?
Who are you communicating with? In what context? What type of data are you wanting to receive?

Lloyd McKenzie said:

Who are you communicating with? In what context? What type of data are you wanting to receive?

Hi @Lloyd McKenzie thank you for the brief education. I appreaciate that. My question is that if I want to receive Non-FHIR data from external payers for 21 US Core Profiles. How can I get in touch with the Payer's External Data

I'm still not really understanding. If you're using US Core profiles, then the data will, by definition, be FHIR data. If you're receiving non-FHIR data, then this really isn't a great place to ask the question as the focus of this community is around sharing data in standardized ways. Can you give a specific example of what you mean by "non-FHIR data"?
